name: Laser Dodger
description:
This is a simple prototype of a 2D platformer survival game. It's quite rudimentary and basic.

You play as a cube that can jump, double jump and dash. Up to 3 drones will spawn after every 5 seconds. These drones will fire projectiles towards the player. If the player dodges a projectile, they get a point, if they get hit by the projectile, they lose a point. The speed of the projectile gradually increases every 7 seconds after the 3 drones have been spawned. When the speed of the drone reaches the maximum speed, the ground level will turn red. 

The game ends when the player hits the red layer or has a negative score.
